    • checkUser

      public boolean checkUser(String id, String token) throws org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException
      Check if the "sub" field of the access token matches the user id
      Parameters:
      id - String - User id
      token - String - Access token
      Returns:
      boolean - True if the "sub" field of the access token matches the user id, false otherwise
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException - if an error occurs while decoding the token
